name: qgis
description: QGIS is a free, open source, cross platform (lin/win/mac) geographical information system (GIS)

3d.description: Determines whether QGIS 3D library should be built

bindings.description: Determines whether Python bindings should be built

customwidgets.description: Determines whether the QGIS custom widgets for QtCreator should be built

desktop.description: Determines whether the QGIS desktop (main app) should be built

gui.description: Determines whether the QGIS gui should be built

process.description: Determines whether the command line QGIS process tool should be built

quick.description: Build the QGIS quick components for mobile interfaces

server.description: Determines whether QGIS server should be built
